Question: On 10 November 2006, it was announced that this person had miscarried while in Vancouver shooting a new film, Blonde and Blonder.
Hints: After the 1998 divorce, this person became engaged to the model Marcus Schenkenberg; they broke up in 2001.
The tax board had filed a lien against this person on 7 April 2009.
In April 2005, this person starred in a new Fox sitcom Stacked as Skyler Dayton, a party girl who goes to work at a bookstore.
